title: Periscope conference hits the real world in September
text:
Periscope conference hits the real world in September Use your key for the next article Comment Cardone Training Technologies used with permission 
The first user-generated conference for and by Periscope users will take place this September. From the 22 – 24, "Scopers" from the world over will gather up in New York City for an event that should for all intents and purposes, take live streaming to a whole new level. Announced in a press release on July 13, 2015 and hosted by the Periscope Community Summit, New York Scope Week, is the first ever user-generated conference for and by Periscope users. In this, its inaugural year, the summit expects nearly 400 scopers and over 500,000 live stream viewers to tune in. Keep in mind, this event is organized 100% by the community, not Twitter or Periscope. 
The purpose behind New York Scope Week will not only be to foster educational growth in social media and live streaming, but it will also provide a unique experience for networking with those around the globe. Cathy Hackl, who is the director of the Periscope Community Summit, stated, “It has been a long time since I have seen this much excitement surrounding a new social media platform. We are honored to pull together this event that was the brainchild of members within the Periscope community.” 
Summit attendees can expect to experience a variety of panels, workshops, and breakout sessions that will take place at The New World Stage. Keynote speakers are expected to be announced in the coming weeks. In addition to a full schedule of educational opportunities, one will also be able to enjoy several parties that will also take place around the city during the week. 
The current list of speakers includes, but is not limited to the following: 
Amanda Oleander is a freelance professional contemporary artist and Periscope personality. She graduated from the University of North Carolina at Charlotte with a Bachelor of Fine Arts. 
Grant Cardone , a NY Times Best selling author, star of TV's TurnAround King, Radio Show host of Cardone Zone and creator of Whatever It Takes Reality TV show. Cardone has revolutionized entire sales industries and consults Fortune 500 to customize business strategies for expansion. 
Brian Fanzo, Partner and Chief Digital Strategist at Broadsuite helping enterprise technology companies utilize new technology such as Social, Mobile, Analytics and Cloud Computing to be more productive and become more involved in their communities as a social business! Host Twitter Hangouts #SbizHour & #CloudTalk & weekly Podcast Host: SMACtalk and iSocialTalks. 
Kim Garst, a digital and social media marketing strategist & Forbes Top 10 Women Social Media Influencer. She is also the co-founder and CEO of Boom! Social, a leading social media consulting and training company. 
Other speakers include Euro Maestro, Alex Pettitt, Lizza Monet Morales, Alex Khan, Mark Kaye, Sue B. Zimmerman and many more. 
For more information visit periscopesummit.com and connect with Periscope Community Summit on Twitter, Facebook or Periscope (@PeriscopeSummit & @NYScopeWeek). Suggested Links
